txt.en: In the Water-works, ancient Caeryg rumble through the halls. Their presence is causing the Dwarves of Khazad-dûm great concern. They often fight in packs and are quite dangerous to those who attempt to disturb them.
You have defeated the Caeryg in the southern room
You have defeated the Caeryg in the western room
Defeat the Caeryg in the southern room
Deep in the Water-works, there are great Caeryg lurking. You should find them in the hidden rooms of the Water-works and banish them from Moria.
Defeat the Caeryg in the western room
In the farthest depths of the Water-works, there is the greatest of Caeryg, Caerlug. Defeat him to claim your reward.
